sub_title: Public Engagement Lead at Achmea Innovation Hub
summary: I am an economist by training and have extensive experience in the Dutch banking (ABN AMRO Bank) and insurance industry (Achmea), with a focus on innovation, marketing and sales. Additionally I have broad experience in the field of international partnerships, corporate governance and grant management through years of collaboration with EIT Health, EIT Digital, Climate KIC and EIT Urban Mobility.  I have been guest lecturer in innovation & finance for new businesses and start-ups at several institutions for many year, mentor at PowerHUB z.ú and Chairperson of the Managing Board of EIT Urban Mobility Association since 2023.

profile_positions.description: Public Engagement is a kind of Cooperative Societal Innovation, this policy strives to solve major social challenges in the areas of health, living & working, mobility and income. Public Engagement acts in partnerships with business partners, scientists and educators and/or has public financial support (EU and NL).
profile_positions.title: Public Engagement Lead

profile_positions.description: Guest lecturer Achmea Internal Course Partnerships in collaboration with Alliantie Partners.
profile_positions.title: Guest Lecturer

profile_positions.description: SkyCare is an international partnership to create the first European virtual hospital. Partners are Erasmus Medical Center, University of Lódz, Karolinska Hospital, Eurapco and Philips. Project has been supported financially by EIT, a body of the European Union.
profile_positions.title: Chair Steering Committee SkyCare

profile_positions.description: Production of "Healthcare in Europe" part I (2018) and part II (2019); the finance and reimbursement systemen of 22 European countries in collaboration with dr. Y van Kemenade and dr. W. Niessing AAG. Both productions have been supported financially by EIT, a body of the European Union.
profile_positions.title: Producer "Healthcare in Europe"

profile_positions.description: Chairman of the Vereniging Achmea Community Team. Vereniging Achmea is the association of Achmea clients (2012: 5,5 million in The Netherlands) and main shareholder of Achmea (market value € 5,7 billion  in 2012). It secures the interests of the cooperative roots of Achmea. Vereniging Achmea Community Team executes her social media strategy by using on-line platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter.
profile_positions.title: Chair Social Media Team Vereniging Achmea

profile_positions.description: Achmea representative joint-venture Myler.nl, a digital community for freelancers. Myler is the winner of the FD Gazelle Award 2012.

profile_positions.description:
Bridging the gap between the online customers and the offline core business of Achmea by developing various online (social media) initiatives:
- Goedenwel.nl (community for people over 55)
- Goedgenoeg.nl (digital insurance company)
- Pensioenkoers.nl (webshop for pensions)
- Mijnerfenisgoedgeregeld.nl (digital legacy file)
- Dedagelijksedingen.nl (digital finance book)
- Myler.nl (online portal for freelancers)

profile_positions.description: EIT Health leverages the expertise of more than 140 leading organisations spanning key areas of healthcare, such as pharma, medtech, payers, research institutions and universities.
profile_positions.title: Member Strategic Innovation Board

profile_positions.description: EIT Health has a network of Co-Location Centres, which act as local headquarters in various cities around Europe and helps to ensure local partner engagement. Rotterdam is the Co-Location Centre for the region Belgium - Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Innovation Lead EIT Health Belgium - Netherlands
Interim Head Social Media EIT Health e.V.

profile_positions.description: EIT Health is a consortium of more than 50 core partners and 90 associate partners from leading businesses, research centres and universities across 14 EU countries. EIT Health was designated as an EIT Knowledge and Innovation Community (KIC) by the EIT Governing Board on 9 December 2014.  EIT (European Institute of Innovation and Technology) is a body of the European Union and based in Budapest.
profile_positions.title: Member Steering Committee Belgium - The Netherlands

profile_positions.description: EIT Digital seeks to generate significant innovations from top European research results. The objective is incubation, market uptake and rapid growth of these innovations. EIT Digital focuses the investments on a limited number of innovation areas that we have selected with respect to European relevance and leadership potential - the Innovation Action Lines. EIT Digital currently has five action lines: Digital Industry, Digital Cities, Digital Wellbeing, Digital Infrastructure and Digital Finance.
profile_positions.title: Member Node Strategy Committee

profile_positions.description: EIT Climate-KIC is an European network to realise climate and economic impact by accelerating cleantech start-ups, developing innovation projects and excite students with entrepreneurial thinking. EIT Climate-KIC is funded by the European Institute of Innovation & Technology (EIT).
profile_positions.title: Member Steering Committee

profile_positions.description: Dutch Network Brussels facilitiates the networking of Dutch companies and organisations in the Brussels area. It has over 250 corporate members, more info www.dutchnetwork.be.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board

profile_positions.description: Masterclass NieuweZorg 3.0 is about inspiring decision makers in the health care in order to realize the changes which needed.
profile_positions.title: Guest Lecturer

profile_positions.description: European Alliance Partner Companies AG (Eurapco AG), is an alliance of leading and independent European insurance mutuals. It serves as the preferred platform for knowledge exchange, aiming at being the number one source of practical information for the partners in order to enable them to leverage pan-European business. Eurapco represents about 40 million European citizens.
profile_positions.title: Interim Strategic Manager
